personal.name: Andrea Magazzini
personal.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
personal.tagline: Dynamic, open-minded, and fast learner with international experience
personal.summary: Adept at turning ideas into working solutions, mentoring teams, and delivering robust software for startups, corporates, and educational projects. Always motivated by social impact, continuous learning, and sharing knowledge.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Dynamic, open-minded, and fast learner: I consider these skills to be my strengths.
I studied in 3 different Universities in Italy, Norway and France where I achieved a BSc in Electronic Engineering and an European MSc double degree in Advanced Robotics.

My professional career started working in a corporate as Software Engineer in Switzerland, where I improved my technical skills for about 4 years. Since 2021 I decided to get more experiences in startups to have more flexibility and face challenges in different ways.

Currently living as a digital nomad, I combine my passion for technology with my love for travel and exploring new cultures. This lifestyle allows me to work with diverse teams from around the world while experiencing different perspectives.
Being social and getting in touch with new people, from different cultures, in order to share knowledge and ideas, has always brought me inspiration and new ways of thinking.
I always try to adapt myself because I think nothing is static in this World.

softSkills.name: Resilience
softSkills.description: Expert-level resilience demonstrated through successfully navigating multiple company closures and layoffs, always leveraging personal networks and maintaining forward momentum. Turned challenging situations into growth opportunities, consistently finding new roles and adapting career trajectory without losing professional momentum.

softSkills.name: Adaptability
softSkills.description: Expert-level adaptability shown through digital nomad lifestyle (55+ countries since 2021), seamlessly adapting to different cultures, time zones, and work environments. Studied in 3 different universities across Italy, Norway, and France. Successfully transitioned from corporate to startup environments, and adapted architecture during business pivots (uDroppy technical pivot).

softSkills.name: Mentoring
softSkills.description: Proficient to expert in mentoring demonstrated through onboarding and upskilling junior developers (uDroppy), accelerating ramp-up in React/Next.js and raising code quality. Teaching at Tomorrow University (4.5/5 feedback scores) and Challenge Network (20+ beginners), with strong engagement and clarity. Led collaborative discussions and live mentoring sessions that boosted learner outcomes.

softSkills.name: Team Development
softSkills.description: Proficient in team development through structured feedback, fostering autonomy, and supporting growth of junior teammates. Supported onboarding within international remote teams at Tomorrow University. Facilitated workshops for children (Hack an App) and organized community sprints that enabled talents to collaborate and learn together.

softSkills.name: Collaboration
softSkills.description: Proficient in collaboration, especially in remote/async environments. Experienced working with diverse international teams across product, design, and backend. Successfully coordinated with teams from around the world, enabling effective cross-cultural collaboration. Managed association budgets and organized events for large student groups (AEGEE, ESN).

softSkills.name: Communication
softSkills.description: Proficient in clear communication through group facilitation, structured information exchange, and effective teaching. Achieved strong feedback for engagement and clarity in teaching roles. Led collaborative discussions that boosted learner engagement. Clear communication in international, remote settings with diverse cultural backgrounds.

softSkills.name: Creativity
softSkills.description: Proficient in creativity demonstrated through innovative solutions: designed 3 innovative online learning challenges (IoT, Cybersecurity, Robotics), initiated proof-of-concept visualizations with D3.js and Neo4j, and spearheaded ideation of community sprints structure. Delivered creative programming workshops for children, stimulating tech curiosity.

softSkills.name: Pragmatism
softSkills.description: Proficient in pragmatism through identifying quick wins for MVP delivery under time constraints while maintaining clean code and sustainable architecture. Built multiple MVPs from scratch (including the pre-incorporation A-List platform and uDroppy SaaS). Offers rapid MVP creation services. Successfully integrated legacy APIs under challenging conditions and maintained legacy applications.

softSkills.name: Time Management
softSkills.description: Proficient in time management through effectively managing multiple concurrent priorities: Challenge Owner at Tomorrow University, Co-founder at A-List, and teaching roles simultaneously. Successfully balanced full-time roles with side projects and continuous learning. Managed association budgets and organized events while maintaining professional commitments.

softSkills.name: Stress Handling
softSkills.description: Proficient in stress handling through staying calm under pressure during company closures, layoffs, and challenging technical situations. Successfully improvised when necessary (legacy API integrations, technical pivots). Maintained composure while managing release pipelines across Apple Store and Google Play, and during rapid MVP development under tight deadlines.

experience.title: Challenge Owner
experience.description: Tomorrow University of Applied Sciences is a German state-recognized, remote-first university focused on empowering impact-driven leaders and changemakers. As a Challenge Owner, I design and deliver innovative online learning challenges with hands-on tools for Master's and MBA learners.
achievements: Designed and delivered 3 innovative online learning challenges (IoT, Cybersecurity, Robotics) with hands-on tools (Microbit, Thunkable, flow diagrams)
Achieved learner feedback scores of 4.5/5 (IoT module) and enabled highly practical project experience for students
Led collaborative discussions and live mentoring, boosting learner engagement and capstone outcomes
Supported growth and onboarding of junior teammates within an international remote team

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Drove implementation of xGrowth, Tomorrow University's growth-focused digital campus area, including an AI assistant and related platform features, working across a data stack with MongoDB for core user/platform data and Strapi/PostgreSQL for structured content.
achievements: Owned key xGrowth product features: AI assistant "Evo", the events section, a multilingual experience via Weglot, and the mission journal where learners can post and receive comments from peers.
Collaborated with product, design, and backend teams to optimize and scale the platform, supporting thousands of users.

experience.title: Co-founder
experience.description: Co-founded and built the pre-incorporation MVP for a talent/community platform focused on post-hiring support and upskilling.
achievements: Built the MVP for a talent/community platform (Next.js, Supabase, Claude, Whisper), focused on post-hiring support and upskilling
Spearheaded ideation and structure of community "sprints," enabling talents to collaborate and learn
Developed platform functionalities to track candidate activity and facilitate talent-company matching
Ran initial pilots with a small recruiting company (WeClose) and travel company WeRoad (OneDay Group), validating the concept with real candidates and hiring teams

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Worked as a Senior Software Engineer on SAFE-living, a contactless emergency system that automatically calls for help when needed, enhancing safety and quality of life at home.
achievements: Implemented multiple SAFE-living mobile features (React Native, TypeScript), including in-app payments and improvements to the emergency alert experience.
Handled the procedures and technical steps required for app validation and releases on both Apple App Store and Google Play.
Collaborated with more senior engineers plus hardware, data, and support teams on QA and bug fixing, improving reliability of the emergency detection and notification pipeline for end users.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Built Borderl3ss, a new SaaS logistics platform within the uDroppy ecosystem, from scratch. The product was designed to help DTC brands expand and scale their logistics operations across Europe and beyond, offering 24/48h delivery across Europe and managing Cash-on-Delivery where needed.
achievements: Built a SaaS e-commerce platform from scratch, handling the shift from frontend (Next.js) to backend with AWS serverless
Integrated legacy APIs under challenging conditions
Onboarded and mentored junior developer, accelerating her ramp-up in React/Next.js and raising code quality across the team
Led technical pivot as business focus changed, adapting architecture to new scaling needs

experience.title: Professional Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed full-stack banking, payments, and mobility solutions for major Swiss clients (Credit Suisse, Clientis, CIC, SBB, SIX Payments) in agile SCRUM teams.
achievements: Built and maintained front-end features for online banking platforms (Credit Suisse, Clientis, CIC) using React (Redux & Saga), TypeScript, and Spring-based backends, improving usability and delivery speed.
Worked on a linked mobility project for SBB, parsing raw mobility data and loading it into a Neo4j graph database to enable analysis of connected journeys.
Contributed to SIX Payments systems using COBOL, C++ and Java on Tandem NonStopSQL, adding features and reliability while introducing automated tests with JUnit and Mockito.
Supported marketing and data-driven solutions using Oracle, Kafka, and proof-of-concept visualizations with D3.js and Neo4j for innovative client use cases.

experience.title: Web Programming Instructor
experience.description: Taught HTML, CSS, JavaScript to beginners with project-based learning.
achievements: Taught HTML, CSS, JavaScript to 20+ beginners
Implemented live coding and project-based learning
Earned strong feedback for engagement and clarity

experience.title: Workshop Facilitator
experience.description: Delivered creative programming workshops for children, stimulating tech curiosity and inclusion.
achievements: Facilitated programming workshops for children
Promoted tech curiosity and inclusion through hands-on learning
Collaborated with UBS and ti&m to deliver educational events

volunteering.title: Treasurer
volunteering.description: Managed association budgets, organized events, reporting and transparency for large student groups.

volunteering.title: Treasurer
volunteering.description: Managed association budgets, organized events, reporting and transparency for large student groups.

volunteering.title: Active Member
volunteering.description: Active member in plastic recycling and sustainability projects.

education.title: Digital Garage - Switzerland Academy
education.description: Intensive web development training program focused on modern web technologies and best practices

education.title: European Master on Advanced Robotics (EMARO)
education.description: Double degree European Master on Advanced Robotics (EMARO) between Ecole Centrale de Nantes (France) and Università degli studi di Genova (Italy), focusing on advanced robotics, automation, and intelligent systems
details: European Master II on Advanced Robotics - Università degli studi di Genova, Italy (2015-2016)
European Master I on Advanced Robotics - Ecole Centrale de Nantes, France (2014-2015)

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Electronic Engineering
education.description: Bachelor's degree in Electronic Engineering covering electronics, control systems, signal processing, and embedded systems. Erasmus semester at Universitet i Agder, Norway (Aug 2012 - Dec 2012)

travel.title: World Traveler
travel.description: 55+ countries visited, nomad since 2021, passionate about multicultural collaboration, adventure, and social impact.

innovation.title: Innovation & Teaching
innovation.description: Driven by innovation, hands-on projects, and teaching others, especially when technology creates value for people and society.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Always curious, dedicated to expanding expertise in AI and interested in web3, decentralization, and the next wave of digital transformation.

services.title: Rapid MVP Creation
services.description: One Hour Vibe Coding - Rapid MVP creation and client collaboration

services.title: Freelance Projects
services.description: Open for freelance projects and technical consulting

services.title: Technical Teaching
services.description: Available for technical teaching, workshops, and mentoring

hrMessage: Creative, resilient, and versatile engineer with strong mentoring skills and international experience. If you need someone who builds, adapts, and inspires — even if not a perfect fit today, don't forget this profile tomorrow.

frontend.description: 8+ years building production React/Next.js applications at ti&m, uDroppy, Tomorrow University, and the pre-incorporation A-List MVP. Expert in modern UI/UX, state management, and performance optimization. Taught HTML/CSS/JavaScript to 20+ beginners, demonstrating deep understanding of web fundamentals.

skills.name: React
skills.description: Expert-level proficiency with 8+ years of experience. Built production applications at ti&m, uDroppy, Tomorrow University, and the pre-incorporation A-List MVP. Deep knowledge of hooks, context, state management, and performance optimization.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: Expert in Next.js with extensive experience building full-stack applications. Built MVPs for uDroppy SaaS platform and the pre-incorporation A-List talent platform. Proficient in SSR, SSG, API routes, and deployment optimization.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: Expert-level TypeScript usage across all recent projects. Strong typing practices, generics, and type-safe architecture. Used extensively in React, Next.js, Node.js, and React Native projects.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Expert JavaScript developer with deep understanding of ES6+, async patterns, and modern frameworks. Used across full-stack development, teaching (Challenge Network), and legacy system modernization.

skills.name: React Native
skills.description: Proficient in React Native for mobile development. Delivered mobile hybrid features for IoT safety devices at Helpany (formerly Sedimentum AG), handling release pipelines across Apple Store and Google Play.

skills.name: D3.js
skills.description: Proficient in data visualization. Initiated proof-of-concept visualizations with D3.js and Neo4j at ti&m to support innovative client solutions and data-driven insights.

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.description: Strong proficiency in HTML and CSS. Taught HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to 20+ beginners at Challenge Network with project-based learning. Used in all web development projects.

backend.description: Built serverless architectures with AWS Lambda for uDroppy SaaS and Tomorrow University AI assistant. Developed full-stack banking solutions with Java/Spring at ti&m. Handled legacy API integrations and modernized COBOL/Java systems. Introduced automated testing at uDroppy. Strong experience in RESTful APIs, real-time applications, and enterprise architectures.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Expert in Node.js backend development. Built serverless APIs with AWS Lambda, RESTful services, and real-time applications. Used in uDroppy, Tomorrow University (AI assistant), and the pre-incorporation A-List platform.

skills.name: Serverless
skills.description: Proficient in serverless architecture. Built uDroppy SaaS platform with AWS serverless, handling the shift from frontend to backend. Experience with AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and serverless deployment patterns.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Proficient in Java development. Developed full-stack banking solutions with Java/Spring at ti&m. Maintained and modernized legacy applications, including COBOL and Java systems.

skills.name: Spring
skills.description: Proficient in Spring framework. Developed banking solutions and enterprise applications at ti&m, improving feature delivery across teams with Spring-based architectures.

skills.name: C++
skills.description: Competent in C++ from engineering background and testing legacy applications. Used for testing and maintaining legacy systems at ti&m.

skills.name: COBOL
skills.description: Competent in COBOL from legacy system maintenance. Maintained and modernized legacy COBOL applications at ti&m, ensuring system reliability and integration with modern systems.

cloudDevOps.description: Built complete serverless SaaS platform (uDroppy) with AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and Vercel. Deployed and optimized Next.js applications supporting thousands of users. Experience with Docker containerization, Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, and edge functions. Successfully managed release pipelines across Apple Store and Google Play.

skills.name: AWS
skills.description: Proficient in AWS services. Built serverless architectures with Lambda, API Gateway, and other AWS services. Used in uDroppy SaaS platform and Tomorrow University (xGrowth features with AI assistant).

skills.name: Docker
skills.description: Proficient in containerization with Docker. Used for development environments, deployment pipelines, and application containerization at ti&m and other projects.

skills.name: Vercel
skills.description: Proficient in Vercel deployment and optimization. Used for deploying Next.js applications, including uDroppy platform and personal projects. Strong understanding of edge functions and performance optimization.

skills.name: Jenkins
skills.description: Competent in CI/CD with Jenkins. Used for build pipelines and deployment automation at ti&m for banking solutions and enterprise applications.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: Expert in Git version control. Used extensively across all projects for collaboration, code review, and team coordination. Mentored junior developers on Git best practices and PR workflows at uDroppy.

databases.description: Built the pre-incorporation A-List platform MVP with Supabase for authentication and real-time features. Developed marketing systems with Oracle and Kafka at ti&m for event streaming. Initiated proof-of-concept with Neo4j graph database for innovative client solutions. Experience in database design, query optimization, and real-time data processing.

skills.name: Supabase
skills.description: Proficient in Supabase for backend-as-a-service. Built the pre-incorporation A-List talent platform MVP with Supabase, handling authentication, database, and real-time features for the community platform.

skills.name: Neo4j
skills.description: Proficient in graph databases. Initiated proof-of-concept visualizations with Neo4j and D3.js at ti&m to support innovative client solutions and relationship mapping.

skills.name: Kafka
skills.description: Proficient in event streaming with Kafka. Developed marketing systems using Kafka at ti&m, handling real-time data processing and event-driven architectures.

skills.name: Oracle
skills.description: Competent in Oracle databases. Developed marketing systems with Oracle at ti&m, including database design and query optimization for enterprise applications.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: Competent in MongoDB and document-oriented data modelling. Used alongside PostgreSQL/Strapi at Tomorrow University (MongoDB for core user/platform data, Strapi/PostgreSQL for structured content) and during development of the Borderl3ss platform while working at uDroppy.
